title: Astral Projection Chamber Adventure #76
goal: Solve the puzzles, achieve the main objective, and escape.

rooms.name: Meditation Chamber
rooms.description: A dimly lit circular room with cushions arranged in a mandala pattern. Incense smoke curls through the air, and crystalline singing bowls line the walls. Strange symbols glow faintly on the floor. A heavy wooden chest sits in the corner, and an ornate cabinet stands against the wall. The air hums with spiritual energy.

items.name: carved wooden chest
items.description: An ancient chest decorated with seven colored circles representing the chakras

items.name: meditation instruction scroll
items.description: A scroll with teachings about astral projection
items.text: The path to astral projection requires balance of the seven chakras. Master Shen teaches that the silver cord connects body to spirit. The astral traveler is known as the Wanderer. Remember: there are seven energy centers in the human body.

items.name: ethereal silver key
items.description: A key that seems to shimmer between solid and transparent

items.name: spirit cabinet
items.description: A tall cabinet with intricate carvings of souls leaving their bodies

items.name: astral traveler's journal
items.description: A journal documenting experiences in the astral plane
items.text: Journal of Master Shen: I have traveled the astral plane for decades. The silver cord always guides me home. To pass through the gateway, one must answer the questions of the guardians. Know what connects us, where consciousness travels, and who you are in the spirit realm.

items.name: glowing crystal pendant
items.description: A pendant that pulses with inner light, said to enhance astral abilities

items.name: silk meditation cushions
items.description: Comfortable cushions arranged in a sacred pattern

items.name: folded note
items.description: A small note hidden beneath the cushions
items.text: Note from apprentice: Master Shen says the astral plane is where our consciousness goes during projection. I must remember this for the gateway test.

items.name: shimmering astral doorway
items.description: A doorway that ripples like water, leading to the astral plane. It seems to respond only to those carrying spiritual artifacts.

rooms.name: Astral Plane
rooms.description: You float in a vast space of swirling colors and ethereal mists. Ghostly forms drift past, and distant stars pulse with consciousness. The laws of physics seem optional here. Three luminous pillars stand in a triangle formation, each inscribed with ancient wisdom. A magnificent gateway of pure light hovers at the far end, guarded by spectral sentinels.

items.name: pillar of connection
items.description: A glowing pillar covered in symbols of linked souls
items.text: Pillar inscription: 'The silver cord binds the astral body to the physical form. It is the lifeline that ensures safe return from the spirit realm.'

items.name: pillar of travel
items.description: A pillar depicting souls journeying through space
items.text: Pillar inscription: 'The astral plane is the realm where consciousness travels free from physical constraints. Here, thought becomes reality and distance has no meaning.'

items.name: pillar of identity
items.description: A pillar showing a figure split between physical and spiritual forms
items.text: Pillar inscription: 'In the astral realm, you are known as the Wanderer - one who walks between worlds, seeking enlightenment beyond the physical.'

items.name: floating energy sphere
items.description: A sphere of condensed spiritual energy hovering in the air

items.name: crystal of enlightenment
items.description: A radiant crystal containing concentrated spiritual wisdom

items.name: ethereal spirit chest
items.description: A translucent chest that phases in and out of visibility

items.name: Master Shen's teachings
items.description: A scroll containing the master's final lessons
items.text: Final Teaching: The gateway to higher dimensions opens only to those who understand the nature of astral travel. Remember the silver cord, the astral plane, and your true identity as the Wanderer.

items.name: gateway of pure light
items.description: A magnificent portal radiating divine energy. Three questions appear in glowing script before it.

password_questions.question: What connects the astral body to the physical form?
password_questions.hint: Check the pillar of connection and Master Shen's journal

password_questions.question: Where does consciousness travel during astral projection?
password_questions.hint: The pillar of travel and the hidden note explain this

password_questions.question: What is your identity in the spirit realm?
password_questions.hint: The pillar of identity reveals your spiritual name

rooms.name: Higher Dimension
rooms.description: You have transcended! You float in a space of pure consciousness where time and space merge into infinite possibility. Beings of pure light welcome you. You have achieved the ultimate goal of astral projection - complete spiritual liberation. The crystal of enlightenment in your possession resonates with the energy of this realm, confirming your mastery.

items.name: enlightened beings
items.description: Radiant entities of pure consciousness who have achieved ultimate transcendence

items.name: pool of infinite consciousness
items.description: A shimmering pool reflecting all possible realities simultaneously

rooms.win_message: You have successfully mastered astral projection and reached the higher dimension! Your consciousness expands beyond all physical limitations. Master Shen's teachings have guided you to enlightenment. You are now one with the infinite cosmos, a true master of the astral realm. You win!
